meanings.sent1: She was the meekest student in the class, always waiting her turn patiently.
meanings.sent2: The meekest kitten in the litter approached timidly for a gentle pet.
meanings.sent3: The meekest puppy in the park sat patiently waiting for its owner, wagging its tail.
meanings.sent4: Among the colorful flowers, the meekest daisy stood out with its delicate petals.
meanings.sent5: The meekest child in the family always shared toys without a fuss, showing true humility.

meanings.definition: Most gentle or mild in manner
meanings.sent1: His meekest smile reassured everyone that he meant no harm.
meanings.sent2: The meekest breeze rustled the leaves softly in the peaceful garden.
meanings.sent3: The meekest melody played by the musician brought tears to the audience's eyes.
meanings.sent4: In the meekest light of dawn, the world seemed calm and serene.
meanings.sent5: The meekest touch of her hand on his shoulder comforted him in a gentle way.

meanings.sent1: He was the meekest member of the team, always following others' lead.
meanings.sent2: The meekest voice in the room barely whispered its opinion, afraid to speak up.
meanings.sent3: The meekest driver on the road drove so slowly that even turtles passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her meekest outfit made her blend into the background, avoiding attention.
meanings.sent5: The meekest response to the challenge showed his lack of self-assertion in the group.
